item.title: タイ警察は、寺院に無政府主義者のシンボルをスプレーでペイントした活動家の記事をめぐり、ジャーナリストのナッタフォル・メクソブホンとナッタフォン・パンフォンサノンを逮捕（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Thai police arrest journalists Nattaphol Meksobhon and Nattaphon Phanphongsanon over a story on an activist spray painting an anarchist symbol on a temple  —  Two Thai journalists have been arrested for their story about an activist spray painting an anarchist symbol and a symbol critical of …

item.title: フォックス、ディズニー、WBDの3社がスポーツストリーミングサービスを立ち上げる。
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
A look at the Fox, Disney, and WBD venture to create a sports streaming service, which will include live feeds of channels like ESPN and TNT  —  Watching sports has never been more complicated or expensive.  It's going to get worse before it gets better.  —  Good morning from Los Angeles.

item.title: 米司法省のジョナサン・カンター氏とのQ&A：グーグルのアドテクと検索事件、メディア統合、ペンギンとサイモン＆シュスターの合併阻止などについて（Nilay Patel/The Verge）
item.description:
Nilay Patel / The Verge:
Q&A with the US DOJ's Jonathan Kanter on Google's ad tech and search cases, media consolidation, blocking Penguin's merger with Simon & Schuster, and more  —  The assistant attorney general says “the resonance these issues have is something that I've never witnessed in my lifetime.”

item.title: Spotifyのデータを利用している音楽百科事典EveryNoiseは、Spotifyが12月にサイトを運営する従業員を解雇した後に更新を停止し、ファンを怒らせている（Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Music encyclopedia EveryNoise, which uses Spotify data, stopped updating after Spotify laid off the employee running the site in December, pissing off its fans  —  Now, Glenn McDonald's beloved Every Noise At Once project is in jeopardy  —  On a brutal December day, 17% of Spotify employees found …

item.title: ニールセンとアドビ・アナリティクス：スーパーボウル2024はCBSとストリーミングサービスで平均視聴者数1億2340万人を記録し、史上最も視聴されたテレビ放送となった（Selome Hailu/Variety）
item.description:
Selome Hailu / Variety:
Nielsen and Adobe Analytics: Super Bowl 2024 averaged 123.4M viewers across CBS and streaming services, making the game the most-watched telecast ever  —  The Feb. 11 Super Bowl game between the Kansas City Chiefs and the San Francisco 49ers brought in an average of 123.4 million viewers …

item.title: スタジオジブリ作品を含む世界中の大胆な作品をリリースすることで、米国の観客のためにアニメーションを再定義している映画配給会社GKidsについて（Carlos Aguilar/New York Times）
item.description:
Carlos Aguilar / New York Times:
A look at movie distributor GKids, which is redefining animation for US audiences by releasing bold work from around the world, including Studio Ghibli's movies  —  The small distributor has outsize influence because it handles Studio Ghibli films in the United States.  Its titles have earned 13 Oscar nods.

item.title: 1月29日に追加料金を支払っていない米国の加入者がダウングレードされたアマゾンプライムビデオのベーシック広告ティアは、ドルビービジョンHDRやドルビーアトモスをサポートしていない（John Archer/Forbes）
item.description:
John Archer / Forbes:
Amazon Prime Video's basic ad tier, which US subscribers who didn't pay extra were downgraded to on January 29, doesn't support Dolby Vision HDR or Dolby Atmos  —  Amazon AMZN caused a furor recently when it announced that it was introducing advertisements right across its Prime Video streaming service.

item.title: ジョン・スチュワートとレイチェル・マドウが月曜出演でトークTVを盛り上げるテストに注目；Vivvix：デイリー・ショーの2022年の広告売上は$39.9Mに対し、2014年は$129.1Mだった（Brian Steinberg/Variety）
item.description:
Brian Steinberg / Variety:
A look at Jon Stewart and Rachel Maddow's test to boost talk TV via Monday appearances; Vivvix: Daily Show had $39.9M in ad sales in 2022 vs. $129.1M in 2014  —  Can Mondays do for the TV business what Thursdays and Sundays once did?  Some of the medium's best-known personalities are trying to figure this question out.

item.title: ファンダム、新ジェネレーティブAI機能「Quick Answers」でファンの質問に不正確な回答をし、ファンWikiクリエイターからの批判に直面（Emilia David/The Verge）
item.description:
Emilia David / The Verge:
Fandom faces criticism from fan Wiki creators after its new generative AI feature Quick Answers gives inaccurate answers to fan questions  —  Fandom, which hosts wikis for many fandoms, will roll out generative AI features that it previously tested but now promises users will be able to opt out.

item.title: Xは今月後半から、広告主がクリエイターの動画の前に広告を掲載できるようにする計画で、収益分配を提供する予定だが、詳細は明らかにしていない（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
X plans to let advertisers run ads before creators' videos starting later this month, and will offer a revenue split but does not disclose any details  —  Elon Musk's X is adding new advertiser targeting features to better entice video creators and compete against YouTube.

item.title: 404 Mediaの共同設立者4人へのインタビュー。彼らはそれぞれテック系ニュースの25％を所有しており、立ち上げから半年で黒字になったという（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
Interviews with the four co-founders of 404 Media, who each own 25% of the tech news outlet, which they say is profitable six months after launch  —  “Owning our own work, and being beholden to no one but our readers and colleagues — as opposed to say, investors, venture capitalists …

item.title: Meta、米Threadsで "今日の話題 "のテストを開始、アプリ内の検索ページやFor Youフィードに表示、政治的な内容を取り上げることも（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Meta begins testing “today's topics” on Threads in the US, surfaced in the app on the Search page and in the For You feed, that can feature political content  —  After acknowledging last week that Meta's X competitor Threads would not actively recommend political content …

item.title: NPR「モーニング・エディション」の司会を24年間務めたベテラン放送作家、ボブ・エドワーズが76歳で死去（Lynn Neary/NPR）
item.description:
Lynn Neary / NPR:
Bob Edwards, the veteran broadcaster who hosted NPR's Morning Edition for 24 years, dies at 76  —  Bob Edwards, the veteran broadcaster and longtime host of Morning Edition who left an indelible mark on NPR's sound, has died.  He was 76 years old.  —  NPR's Susan Stamberg …

item.title: スレート社によると、2023年は27年の歴史の中で最も収益性の高い年であり、投資とポッドキャストとウェブサイトの成長により、収益は前年比28％増となった（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Slate says 2023 was the most profitable year in its 27 year history, with revenue up 28% YoY through investments and growth in its podcasts and website  —  The Scoop  —  Amid a difficult year for news media last year, at least one legacy digital media company has quietly been moving the other direction.

item.title: ガーディアンは、12月31日までの9ヶ月間で広告収入が16％（900万ポンド）減少し、会員収入が予算を300万ポンド下回るため、2023/24年度には3900万ポンドの赤字になると予測している（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Guardian forecasts a £39M deficit in FY 2023/24 as ad revenue was down 16%, or £9M, in the nine months to Dec. 31 and membership revenue was £3M behind budget  —  Digital reader revenue came in 4% below expectations.  —  Advertising revenue at Guardian News and Media was down £9m …
